main event: An unidentified flying object was observed over Baltimore, Maryland on 6 November 1954, described as a circular, luminous object hovering and then accelerating away.
interesting points: Multiple witnesses, including a newspaper reporter and a police officer, reported seeing the object,The object was estimated to be 30-40 feet in diameter and flying at approximately 500-600 mph,The object was described as bright and circular, observed in various locations and times,The investigation was conducted by the U.S. Air Force under Project Blue Book but the identity of the object was not determined, Witnesses claimed the object appeared luminous and moved without sound.
witness description: a newspaper reporter and a police officer
